mapper.select:
select COUNT(*) from `wms_order`
`order_id` = #{orderId} and
`order_operater_user_name` = #{orderOperaterUserName} and
`order_operater_time` = #{orderOperaterTime} and
`order_type` = #{orderType} and
`financial_list_code` = #{financialListCode} and
`purchasing_list_code` = #{purchasingListCode} and
`material_code` = #{materialCode} and
`material_name` = #{materialName} and
`confirm_material_name` = #{confirmMaterialName} and
`material_specs` = #{materialSpecs} and
`confirm_material_specs` = #{confirmMaterialSpecs} and
`material_brand` = #{materialBrand} and
`confirm_material_brand` = #{confirmMaterialBrand} and
`material_unit` = #{materialUnit} and
`order_material_num` = #{orderMaterialNum} and
`financial_center_code` = #{financialCenterCode} and
`order_buyer` = #{orderBuyer} and
`supplier_name` = #{supplierName} and
`order_state` = #{orderState} and
`order_buyer_check_date` = #{orderBuyerCheckDate} and
`order_price_check_date` = #{orderPriceCheckDate} and
`purchasing_order_code` = #{purchasingOrderCode} and
`arrival_date` = #{arrivalDate} and
`received_num` = #{receivedNum} and
`received_date` = #{receivedDate} and
`payment_type` = #{paymentType} and
`payment_rate` = #{paymentRate} and
`budget_type` = #{budgetType} and
`budget_subject` = #{budgetSubject} and
`invest_management_code` = #{investManagementCode} and
`research_test_project` = #{researchTestProject} and
`order_builder_name` = #{orderBuilderName} and
`order_description` = #{orderDescription} and
`order_initial_user_id` = #{orderInitialUserId} and
`order_initial_time` = #{orderInitialTime} and
`order_initial_state` = #{orderInitialState} and
`order_management_type` = #{orderManagementType} and
`order_management_form_name` = #{orderManagementFormName} and
`order_management_form_id` = #{orderManagementFormId} and
`simple_application_object_id` = #{simpleApplicationObjectId} and
`prospective_arrival_date` = #{prospectiveArrivalDate} and
`supplier_code` = #{supplierCode} and
`contract_type` = #{contractType} and
`order_initial_department` = #{orderInitialDepartment} and
`order_initial_user_name` = #{orderInitialUserName} and
`recommended_supplier_name` = #{recommendedSupplierName} and
`warehouse_symbol` = #{warehouseSymbol} and
`cost_management` = #{costManagement} and
`production_line` = #{productionLine} and
`operation_position_code` = #{operationPositionCode} and
`equipment_company` = #{equipmentCompany} and
`spare_parts_brand` = #{sparePartsBrand} and
`spare_parts_order_desc` = #{sparePartsOrderDesc} and
`spare_parts_emergency` = #{sparePartsEmergency} and
`extra_order_reason` = #{extraOrderReason} and
`knife_code` = #{knifeCode} and
`important_project_code` = #{importantProjectCode} and
`warehousing_reason_code` = #{warehousingReasonCode} and
`order_id` in
#{item} and
`order_id` >= #{orderIdSt} and
`order_id` <= #{orderIdEd} and
`order_operater_user_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Order_operater_user_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Order_operater_user_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
